personalInfo.name: John Doe
personalInfo.summary: Experienced software engineer with 5+ years in full-stack development, specializing in Python, React, and cloud architecture. Proven track record of building scalable systems and leading technical teams.

achievements: Published research paper on distributed systems

description: Led development of microservices architecture serving 10M+ users with 99.9% uptime
Reduced API response time by 40% through caching and query optimization
Mentored 5 junior engineers and conducted code reviews for team of 15
Implemented CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions, reducing deployment time by 60%
Developed React-based dashboard with real-time analytics processing 1M events/day
Built RESTful APIs using Python FastAPI with comprehensive test coverage (95%)
Collaborated with cross-functional teams of 20+ members in agile environment
Optimized database queries reducing load time by 50%

projects.name: Resume Tailor
projects.description: AI-powered resume optimization tool using FastAPI backend and React Chrome extension
highlights: Integrated Google Gemini AI for intelligent resume analysis and keyword matching
Built Chrome extension with 1000+ active users and 4.5-star rating
Implemented PDF generation with ATS-friendly formatting

projects.name: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce platform with payment integration and real-time inventory
highlights: Processed $100K+ in transactions with 99.99% payment success rate
Implemented real-time inventory management using WebSockets
Deployed on AWS with auto-scaling handling 10K+ concurrent users
